name: Tea Stall Studio
description: We are a multi-dimensional media and creative house with love for work and craziness for perfection. Our prolific spectrum of work includes every technique related to media, digital as well as creative world that helps you in taking a constructive step towards successful business enhancement. We roam in field of brand consultation, creatives, 3D animation and visual effects, web designing and development, production and editing of video, social media promotion and many more.

locations.address: 1st Floor, Building No-36, Udyog Vihar, Phase 1,
